full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): #, ,MYUR MDZAD YE SHES MGON PO 'KHOR DANG BCAS PAR GSER SKYEMS MCHOD PA 'BUL TSUL NI, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @002A *, ,(CES PA 'DI NI RI KHROD DGE SLONG BLO BZANG 'PHUN TSOG KYIS MYUR MDZAD YE SHES MGON PO PHYAG DRUG PA LA GSER SKYEMS 'BUL TSEG GCAD DGOS ZHES BSKUL BA'I NGOR SH'AKYA DGE SLONG BSKAL BZANG RGYA MTSO'I SBYAR BA'O, MGON PO 'ZHABS BDUNG NAS, DE GNYIS, DGE'O, ,)
